bio: Software engineer with over 5 years of experience building frontend applications, including leading UI development for Amazon Kindle devices. I specialize in creating performant and responsive user interfaces that enhance user engagement
My key skills include React, Next.js, React-Native, Node.js, typescript, C++, and Python.

projects.name: Hexus Embed SDK
projects.description: An embed SDK for Hexus, that integrates interactive product demos into client websites.

projects.name: OpenRabbit
projects.description: An AI-powered conversational assistant that enables residents and visitors to access information about San Francisco's city services and resources efficiently and quickly.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : React.js, Next.js, GPT 4o, Silero VAD, Whisper-Base, Deepgram Aura, Mailgun, Spotify API, Suno.ai, Clerk.dev

projects.name: CityHub
projects.description: An AI-powered conversational assistant that enables residents and visitors to access information about San Francisco's city services and resources efficiently and quickly.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : React.js, FastAPI, Brave Search API, Ollama, LLAMA3, Groq

projects.name: Musician event booking platform
projects.description: A website for county musicians to register and be requested to perform for events by organizers.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : React.js, Redux, Styled-Components, react-router-dom

projects.name: Rubik's Cube solver
projects.description: An interactive website where users can play with the rubik's cube and learn to solve it.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : Chrome cube labs, Javascript, jQuery
